nodes.text: Tetranni body-sculptors were a group renowned for their ability to change their shape via complicated and enthralling dances. The warlord Faarl the Conqueror kept a group of Tetranni body-sculptors for his entertainment in his Fortress Baarlos on the planet Pochi.

The Tetranni body-sculptors are mentioned in passing in the West End Games sourcebook Wanted by Cracken, published in 1993. The book reveals very little about the group, leaving ambiguous whether they are an alien species, a Force-using tradition, or something else entirely.
